fairy_sparklers.name: Fairy Sparklers
fairy_sparklers.description: Multi-colored sparklers that are safe for any age.

bottle_rockets.name: Bottle Rockets
bottle_rockets.description: Smaller projectile fireworks, safe for children above 13 years of age..

roman_candles.name: Roman Candles
roman_candles.description: Multi-colored projectile fireworks. Adult supervision is required

kamuro_swan_shells.name: Kamuro Swan Shells
kamuro_swan_shells.description: Golden colored shelled fireworks. These are professional grade fireworks intended for public productions.

color_bombettes_shells.name: Color Bombettes Shells
color_bombettes_shells.description: Red, white, and blue colored shelled fireworks. These are professional grade fireworks intended for public productions.

patriot_sparklers.name: Patriot Sparklers
patriot_sparklers.description: Red, white, and blue sparklers that are safe for any age.

ninja_sparklers.name: Ninja Sparklers
ninja_sparklers.description: Red and white sparklers that are safe for any age.

tank_firecrackers.name: Turbo Tank
tank_firecrackers.description: Small tank firecracker that is safe for children ages 10 and up. Adult supervision is required.

road_runner.name: Road Runner TNT
road_runner.description: 10 pounds of the finest TNT made West of the Mississippi.

bugs_bunny.name: Bugs Bunny TNT
bugs_bunny.description: 50 pounds of the finest TNT made West of the Mississippi.

wile_e_coyote.name: Wile E. Coyote TNT
wile_e_coyote.description: 100 pounds of the finest TNT made West of the Mississippi.

gadget.name: The Gadget
gadget.description: This is an implosion type atomic bomb first created by J. Robert Oppenheimer during World War II. Only the shell of this weapon remains.

fat_man.name: Fat Man
fat_man.description: This is an implosion type atomic bomb first created by J. Robert Oppenheimer during World War II. Later used in Hiroshima. Top-secret credentials are required to purchase this item.

little_boy.name: Little Boy
little_boy.description: This is an implosion type atomic bomb first created by J. Robert Oppenheimer during World War II. Later used in Nagasaki, the schematics only remain.

j_robert_oppenheimer.name: J. Robert Oppenheimer's Glasses
j_robert_oppenheimer.description: These glasses were once worn by Dr. Oppenheimer during his time spent working for the Manhattan Project. Oppenheimer was wearing these glasses during his famous speech explaining the power of his project.

los_alamos_finnest.name: Lost Alamos Secret Laboratory Key
los_alamos_finnest.description: This is a key stolen from a scientist to get entrance into the Los Alamos Secret Laboratory, home of Oppenheimer's Trinity Test.

alger_hiss_briefings.name: Alger Hiss' Briefcase
alger_hiss_briefings.description: This is a briefcase stolen from Alger Hiss immediately after his court date infront of the House Un-American Activities Committee. It is said that this briefcase still holds top secret Soviet secrets.
